2020.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|60|293$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|82|58$رَبَّكَ|your Lord,|87|101|586$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|122|750$عَمِلُواْ|did|78|92|6052$ٱلسُّوٓءَ|evil|78|92|3816$بِجَهَـٰلَةٍ|in ignorance,|105|119|3817$ثُمَّ|then|50|57|293$تَابُواْ|repented|79|92|1397$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|117|280$ذَٲلِكَ|that,|64|90|28$وَأَصْلَحُوٓاْ|and corrected themselves -|204|230|1398$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|94|58$رَبَّكَ|your Lord,|87|100|586$مِنۢ بَعْدِهَا|after that|112|176|6879$لَغَفُورٌ|(is) surely Oft-Forgiving,|183|312|6239$رَّحِيمٌ|Most Merciful.|113|177|1294$

2023.verse: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ|And We gave him|135|144|5010$فِى|in|48|66|89$ٱلدُّنْيَا|the world|82|100|818$حَسَنَةً‌ۖ|good,|74|92|1784$وَإِنَّهُۥ|and indeed, he|118|136|1195$فِى|in|48|66|89$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|the Hereafter|109|118|978$لَمِنَ|(he) will surely (be) among|198|373|1196$ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ|the righteous.|117|292|1197$

2025.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|68|102$جُعِلَ|was appointed|116|143|10192$ٱلسَّبْتُ|the Sabbath|102|129|10193$عَلَى|for|63|90|52$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|116|20$ٱخْتَلَفُواْ|differed|88|115|1512$فِيهِ‌ۚ|in it.|50|64|32$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|123|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|132|586$لَيَحْكُمُ|will surely judge|125|175|10194$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|165|1056$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|130|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection|159|180|820$فِيمَا|in what|69|110|1058$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|158|94$فِيهِ|[in it]|57|98|32$يَخْتَلِفُونَ|differ.|99|120|1059$

2026.verse: ٱدْعُ|Call|55|70|663$إِلَىٰ|to|53|82|118$سَبِيلِ|(the) way|86|115|1358$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|141|1322$بِٱلْحِكْمَةِ|with the wisdom|128|157|10195$وَٱلْمَوْعِظَةِ|and the instruction|146|160|10196$ٱلْحَسَنَةِ‌ۖ|the good,|88|97|9342$وَجَـٰدِلْهُم|and discuss with them|168|185|10197$بِٱلَّتِى|in that|69|86|10198$هِىَ|which|58|75|665$أَحْسَنُ‌ۚ|(is) best.|81|98|1249$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|87|58$رَبَّكَ|your Lord,|87|96|586$هُوَ|He|48|62|298$أَعْلَمُ|(is) most knowing|137|166|324$بِمَن|of who|65|94|10199$ضَلَّ|has strayed|98|127|1017$عَن|from|54|83|1105$سَبِيلِهِۦ‌ۖ|His way,|84|113|4945$وَهُوَ|And He|67|81|305$أَعْلَمُ|(is) most knowing|137|326|324$بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ|of the guided ones.|149|338|5976$

2027.verse: وَإِنْ|And if|58|72|213$عَاقَبْتُمْ|you retaliate,|109|136|10200$فَعَاقِبُواْ|then retaliate|110|137|10201$بِمِثْلِ|with the like|101|128|1241$مَا|of what|71|98|262$عُوقِبْتُم|you were afflicted|140|154|10202$بِهِۦ‌ۖ|with [it].|79|116|204$وَلَئِن|But if|66|139|1309$صَبَرْتُمْ|you are patient,|127|200|9440$لَهُوَ|surely (it) is|100|173|2957$خَيْرٌ|better|61|98|520$لِّلصَّـٰبِرِينَ|for those who are patient.|195|195|10203$

2020.verse: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful.

2021.verse: Indeed, Abraham was a [comprehensive] leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah.

2022.verse: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.

2023.verse: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous.

2024.verse: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah.

2025.verse: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

2026.verse: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is [rightly] guided.

2027.verse: And if you punish [an enemy, O believers], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient.

2028.verse: And be patient, [O Muhammad], and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire.

2029.verse: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
